subject: Can someone give tips on how to interpret the Audio ITC?
author: dbmdude
full_text:
I have a modified 12-587 and I have been listening but it is really hard to gather any intelligable speech from the scnning because of the proliferation of radio stations in my area.

I listened to every attached sound file here that I could and some of them do not sound like intelligible responses but gibberish from mised radio words OR even parts of radio sentences.

I understand that the best way is to ask questions and then wait for responses, but some of the audio posted here "seems" like plain radio gibberish.

Can someone help me understand?

As a side note anyone that has an iPhone can get iOVILUS and have a 1000 word database that uses the iPhone sensors to allow entities to manipulate and then produces speech.

http://www.digitaldowsing.com/iOvilus

THANKS AGAIN
DBMDude
